name: Dell Streak 7
snippet: Introducing Dell&trade Streak 7. Share photos, videos and movies together. It's small enough to carry around, big enough to gather around.

snippet: The Samsung Gem&trade brings you everything that you would expect and more from a touch display smart phone – more apps, more features and a more affordable price.

name: Nexus S
snippet: Fast just got faster with Nexus S. A pure Google experience, Nexus S is the first phone to run Gingerbread (Android 2.3), the fastest version of Android yet.

snippet: Feel Free to Tab&trade. The Samsung Galaxy Tab&trade brings you an ultra-mobile entertainment experience through its 7” display, high-power processor and Adobe® Flash® Player compatibility.

name: T-Mobile myTouch 4G
snippet: The T-Mobile myTouch 4G is a premium smartphone designed to deliver blazing fast 4G speeds so that you can video chat from practically anywhere, with or without Wi-Fi.

snippet: The Sanyo Zio by Kyocera is an Android smartphone with a combination of ultra-sleek styling, strong performance and unprecedented value.

name: Samsung Transform&trade
snippet: The Samsung Transform&trade brings you a fun way to customize your Android powered touch screen phone to just the way you like it through your favorite themed “Sprint ID Service Pack”.

snippet: The T-Mobile G2 with Google is the first smartphone built for 4G speeds on T-Mobile's new network. Get the information you need, faster than you ever thought possible.
